Blog.post: ALright landon has huge problem that needs solving. one that i cant solve myself, but i wont post it on a public blog. if you want to know and/or help ask me about it. its complicated, and it confuses me. i care alot about alot of people but some dont care about me as much as id like them to...and i cant change that. bye guys -off to punch a kitten p.s. im also probably being way overdramatic i apologize

You are Xuan Wu! Mythological background: Because the turtle has a thick, solid shell that serves as protection - this animal is associated with stability. You enjoy intellectual pursuits. Also, in Feng Shui (the Chinese myths behind choosing a house), the black turtle's solidity is used to protect from cold northern winds. urlLink Which Chinese Mythological Being Are You? brought to you by urlLink

Ok, Update-Mitchell=savior the guy has been alot of help and he even let me stay over at his house. he and claire are all lovey dovey, and its cute new cartoon coming up, nothing incredible, but a nice premise now im bored, nothing to do but play videogames. I called hannah and she told me she'd call back in about an hour, (2 hours ago, roughly) so no real hopes there, ill probably not ge to talk to her till tommorrow. no big though, im trying to be as little less melodramatic, and alittle less clingy other than that MEATLOAF!! and im memorizing sweet tranzestite (the song) as i type! still a little erked, but cant change it, if hannah and Mitchell couldnt fix that part then thats my job! Adios mon Cherie!

RARARARARAR!! im gonna eat you all alive i cant make sense of my stupid mixed up life! everything should be okay, but its not nothing seems to be ok it all seems strange, unfamiliar, unimportant i feel sick most of the time, but never feel any better i just want to know whats wrong is that so hard to figure out? i feel like im driving evrybody away, and if my stupid mental health doesnt get better ill just drive em away even more. help please

Im scared alot. Most of my life is spent in fear of things that can happen of will happen or might happen. At the moment my life is almost perfect, as perfect as it'll ever be. and still that gnawing fear grinds away. Im confused, and if theres some kind of guru out there ill pay! im so tired of everything RAR I KEEL YU ALL!

i wish i was a cloud. They're nice. all they have to do is float around and, be a cloud. Theres no such thing as a bad cloud, or a useless cloud. If a cloud doesnt get a job its still a cloud. im thinking to deep, i might drown im all this depressing shit..i need some bread...
